vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.33.19;
father of: Shechem (H7927H)
Also named: Emmor<\i> (Ἐμμόρ "Hamor" G1697)
§ Hamor = "he-ass"
the Hivite prince of the city of Shechem when Jacob entered Palestine
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈抹 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "公驢"
當雅各進入巴勒斯坦時, 示劍城的希未王子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈抹 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "公驴"
当雅各进入巴勒斯坦时, 示剑城的希未王子
